items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Distinctive design features a cute fluffy poodle in a matching sweater
items.body: This garment is a distinctively designed piece of knitwear in bright red acrylic knit, featuring a fluffy snow-white poodle wearing its own bright red coordinating Christmas themed sweater with antlers on its head. It’s surrounded by several white snowflakes, and the bottom front has a Nordic pattern along the hemline. The entire back of the dress is plain red with no designs. The fabric is a heavy gauge acrylic yarn; the body is a dense flat knit while the turtleneck, cuffs, and hem are a fine rib knit that snugs closer to your body. There is an in-seam hidden hip pocket on each side. Since this is made entirely of acrylic, the red color shouldn’t bleed into the white, as can occasionally happen with natural fabric and dyes. I ordered the medium size because the seller doesn’t offer it in a small. For reference, I’m 127# and usually wear a small to medium; this size medium is a generous fit. The shoulders are broad, so it just hangs on me like a sack and isn’t flattering for my frame. The sizing chart is fairly accurate because regardless of what size you order, the cut is made to fit loosely all around your body so order accordingly. I’m going to give it to my sister since she wears a true medium and prefers a loose fit anyway, so this will fit better and work well for her. The winter holidays are a time of gatherings with family and friends, so you want to be comfortable, and this dress fits the bill. It’s stretchy but doesn’t cling. It would look well paired with tights and flats or leggings and boots since it’s a casual style. Tip: I recommend that you hand wash or machine wash this garment by itself on the gentle cycle because most knit clothing with multiple colors or designs usually have multiple long stitches on the inside that can become easily snagged by other garments that have buttons, hooks, or zippers, and may damage it. Read more
items.author: Sam's mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute But Runs Big
items.body: I actually think this ugly sweater is super cute! It’s good quality, well made, and soft. I would say it runs really big though. I ordered a medium and it’s really big and bulky on me, not flattering, at least on me. I would definitely order a small next time. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Christmas ugly sweater
items.body: This Christmas ugly sweater dress fits perfectly, the warmth is amazing, love the style as well, the quality is great, I like the fact that it has pockets Read more
items.author: M.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweater
items.body: Did not fit right size down from regular size made cheap Read more
items.author: dovie benson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cutest!
items.body: This sweater dress is just SO cute! As a little white dog owner I absolutely couldn’t pass this one up. Despite being oversized I think this is a fairly flattering fit for a big sweater. I ordered mine in a medium and I’m about 5’8. The length of it is exactly what I’d expect for a sweater dress like this and sits right above my knees. The turtle neck can be rolled over a couple times so it doesn’t sit as high on your neck. As someone who doesn’t really like turtlenecks the extra fabric the style it to your liking is much appreciated! As far as warmth goes I find this sweater to be plenty warm. It’s definitely more of a novelty and may need a layer underneath in really cold climates, but for the warm winters we have here this will be thick enough to keep me warm no problem. The material of the sweater is soft and comfortable to wear. It’s not scratchy or plasticy feeling like some cheap sweaters. The design is also sewn in rather than printed on. Add the fact that this has functioning pockets and this sweater really meets all my check boxes! Read more
items.author: Rachel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Red Knit Sweater/Dress - Durable Long Lasting Material - (2) Pockets/Turtleneck
items.body: Ordered this Christmas Ugly Sweater/Dress for Women - Cartoon Pattern Oversized Turtleneck Pullover Style Knit Material Designed Sweater - W/2 Side Pockets - for my wife to wear for the upcoming Holiday season. She's always loved unique designed type knitted sweaters for winter time and through the Christmas Holiday seasons. Recently while shopping online for a special gift for her birthday, I was searching for special sweaters, tops, jackets and then saw this red knitted pullover turtleneck sweater with a pretty puppy designed on the front, and was looking at it and reading about it's size and materials. After reading that it's made of durable acrylic material and pullover turtleneck design and in her XL size, I ordered it. Love this nice sweater!. I like the bright red color and the snow white puppy design. Also like all the Christmastime looks as it has snowflakes and even the puppy is dressed with a sweater that matches this sweater. Wife loves it. She likes that it's a longer length design and it fits her well. It has a good heavier grade knit and should last her many years to come. She loves the ribbed cuffs on the sleeves and around the lower bottom & the turtleneck and they have plenty of stretch to them and helps make it more comfortable to wear. I would call it true to size. When giving it to her after work she put it on and never took it back off until bedtime, so that proves to me she really loved this sweater. It easily earns a (5) star rating in my opinion Read more
items.author: Rick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, Festive, and Perfect for Holiday Parties!
items.body: This sweater is absolutely adorable for holiday parties! I have an annual Christmas party that I’ve attended for the past 15 years, and when I saw this sweater, it immediately caught my eye. I wasn’t sure what to expect, but when I took it out of the package, it was even better than I imagined. The colors are vibrant, and the sequins add just the right touch of sparkle and glitz without being over the top. The material is soft and comfortable, and the length is perfect to wear with leggings on a cold winter night. The sizing is spot on for my 5’9” frame, which is a big plus. All in all, this is a great find and a good deal at this price point. It’s festive, flattering, and fun — exactly what a Christmas sweater should be! Read more
items.author: jayem

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good with leggings
items.body: This sweater dress is a fun and festive piece for the holidays. The oversized fit is great because it's super cozy and comfortable, perfect for a casual party or just lounging around. The cartoon Christmas pattern is amusing and exactly what you want in an "ugly sweater" style. The turtleneck is warm, and a huge plus is that it actually has pockets! For a comfortable, fun, and warm dress that embraces the holiday spirit, this is a fantastic choice. Read more
items.author: Derek Media

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Color options depend on the listing. Pick the shade that matches your wardrobe for the most repeat wear.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
